item.title: To stop the flame about my last snippet of code
item.dc:creator: @Jython super_
item.description:
@Jython wrote:

[quote=“i_own_pking, post:22, topic:321661”][quote author=eczema3 link=topic=418107.msg3075227#msg3075227 date=1261781254]

Sometimes, as i had a A for all of my english tests, i think you should learn to remember more than the last ten posts of a user before you share your idiotic opinion!

His ‘idiotic opinion’ is mostly correct, your claim about your A in English exams seems very unlikely as even when you try to make it seem as if you’re intelligent, you still make mistakes. For example:

as i had a A

I think you’ll find its “an A”,

english

It’s “English” not “english”.

You lack capitals in the correct places, and why would he want to remember the last 10 of your posts? They’re all retarded.
[/quote]

  1. Petebjornx is dutch, therefore why should his english grammar be 100%.
  2. I havn’t seen any of your work here, so im guessing your just one of these kids who tries to follow the crowd?
  3. Frank_, do you seriously just sit here during the day flaming people who are alot younger than you because they may not be able to program as good as you? Peterbjornx is 15 if i remember correctly, so you flame a kid when your in your 20’s i believe.[/quote]

peterbjornx is like 12

Read full topic
item.source: To stop the flame about my last snippet of code

item.title: To stop the flame about my last snippet of code
item.dc:creator: @Nerice Nerice
item.description:
@Nerice wrote:

peterbjornx:

i think its time to leave this crap community again

Mopar, this might not be the best place to put it but… You seriously need to crack down on the attacks, name calling, flaming etc… I am sure I am not the only one that would be willing to contribute but its just not worth it currently, nor is there any desire to try to help the people doing it anyway.

Part of a pm I sent to you on May 01, 2007 when talking about something else… “Seems like everyone around here just wants to degrade, flame etc…” Its now 12/28/2009, 2.5 years later, and its still the same.

Read full topic
item.source: To stop the flame about my last snippet of code

Sometimes, as i had a A for all of my english tests, i think you should learn to remember more than the last ten posts of a user before you share your idiotic opinion!
[/quote]

His ‘idiotic opinion’ is mostly correct, your claim about your A in English exams seems very unlikely as even when you try to make it seem as if you’re intelligent, you still make mistakes. For example:

as i had a A

I think you’ll find its “an A”,

It’s “English” not “english”.

You lack capitals in the correct places, and why would he want to remember the last 10 of your posts? They’re all retarded.[/quote]

item.title: To stop the flame about my last snippet of code
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:7, topic:321661”] private byte[] payload ; private int rawsize ; private int zipsize ; private int compression; private int crc32 ;

Why are all these variables lined up like that, imo it makes your code look worse.[/quote]All of his code is formatted like that, but he likes it more, so why the fuck do you care?

Code formatting is all personal preference.
